name: Chronurgy Magic
description: Manipulators of time who twist events to their advantage.

2.name: Chronal Shift
2.description: As a reaction after you or a creature you can see makes an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, force a reroll. The target must use the new result. You can use this feature twice per long rest.

2.name: Temporal Awareness
2.description: You add your Intelligence modifier to initiative rolls.

6.name: Momentary Stasis
6.description: As an action, force a creature within 60 feet to make a Constitution save. On a failure, the creature is incapacitated and speed 0 until the end of your next turn or it takes damage. Uses equal to your Intelligence modifier per long rest.

10.name: Arcane Abeyance
10.description: When you cast a spell using a slot of 4th level or lower, you can condense the magic into a Tiny bead that holds the spell for up to 1 hour. A creature holding the bead can release the spell using your spell attack bonus and save DC. Once you create a bead, you must finish a short or long rest before doing so again.

14.name: Convergent Future
14.description: When you or a creature you can see makes a roll, you can use your reaction to decide whether the roll succeeds or fails. Using this feature gives you one level of exhaustion, removable only by finishing a long rest.
